resources.string: True Detective\nThe series features a split timeline of two detectives solving a mystery.
Spiderman - Homecoming\nSpiderman joins the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Spiderman - Far From Home\nSpiderman goes far away from home, but trouble follows.
Spiderman - No Way Home\nTom Holland teams up with Tobey and Andrew to take down the Sinister Six.
